title: sadhanam seiya
sahitya:
sAdhanam sheyya vArIrE parama bhakti sAdanam sheyya vArIrE



anupallavi



jAti mada vikAra shaNDaigaLai viDuttE sakalarkkum poduvAna

sanmArgattaip-piDittE 



caraNam 1



kATTuk-kurangu pOlE kani vagaiyuNDenna

kayattinirk-kokkupOrk-kaNmuDi irundenna

nITTImazhittE vEDam kATTIp-payanenna nilaiyAgic-cittattai alaiyAu

kAttirum 



caraNam 2



vanattilE tirindenna malai guhai irundenna valai vizhi mAdarai

aliyena veruttenna

manattinai venriDa mamadaiyai konriDa manrinil Adum jnAna maNiyinai aNUgiDum
